answers.answer: More than likely your anaemic which is common in pregnancy. You didn't do anything wrong. It can't be helped x

question: my obgyn just called me with my blood work results from my glucose screening and I don't have gestational diabetes but she said that I need to be taking 325 mg of ferris sulfate (iron) on top of my prenatals.Is that bad? Did I do something wrong? Can someone explain to me why they put me on these supplements ?
title: Ferrous sulfate?
